fundamentals.value: The water level above a fixed measuring point, i.e., above the station Gauge Datum, in metres.
fundamentals.quality_code: The quality code, rating, of the measure.
fundamentals.ts_id: The water level time series identification code.
fundamentals.measure: measure = value + gauge datum. The gauge datum of a gauge is the reference point of the gauge's site, in metres.

resamples.value: The water level above a fixed measuring point, i.e., above the station Gauge Datum, in metres.
resamples.quality_code: The quality code, rating, of the measure.
resamples.ts_id: The water level time series identification code.
resamples.measure: measure = value + gauge datum. The gauge datum of a gauge is the reference point of the gauge's site, in metres.
